definitions.definition: refuse to give (something that is due to or is desired by another).
examples: the name of the dead man is being withheld
synonyms: keep secret; informalsit on "he withheld the information"

definitions.definition: suppress or hold back (an emotion or reaction).
examples: suppress, repress, hold back, fight back, choke back, control, check, restrain, contain she could not withhold her tears

definitions.definition: (of an employer) deduct (tax) from an employee's paycheck and send it directly to the government.
